Product Description: Stay organized all day with a durable and lightweight backpack from Fur Jaden. This back pack is a stylish and functional accessory for men and women. Can add admiration to an appealing and daring personality with a remarkable aesthetics and functionality. This backpack features an anti-theft design. You can also charge your phone on the go and organize your stuff like pro. Fur Jaden functional back pack is apt to protect your gadgets and belongings from being stolen while you travel, thanks to its special anti-theft design. Now keep your belongings safe with style. The backpack features multiple compartments that you may use for your laptop and other essentials. A remarkable feature of this backpack allows you to charge your phone while you are on the move. With an attached charging dock in the back you may connect a portable power bank with ease. Weighing about 600grams, this backpack is lightweight. The backpack is able to house a laptop of up to 15.6 inches and has seven inner compartments to place your other essentials. Made from durable quality polymer this Fur Jaden back pack is sturdy and reliable. Flaunt this bag with style and low maintenance as this bag is washable. This backpack is also suitable for school or college. The straps are designed to distribute the weight equally on each shoulder preventing any sort of discomfort. Use this back pack for office, college/school or during travels.
